comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15572?focusedCommentId=17499821) by David Dali Susanibar Arce (dsusanibara):*
PR Related: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12538/files

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15572?focusedCommentId=17501005) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 12538
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12538>

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15572?focusedCommentId=17508847) by Alessandro Molina (amol-):*
`[~dsusanibara]` `[~lidavidm]` I'm not sure the merged PR targets the scope of this ticket. The ticket was originally meant to provide an entry point for people that want to get started with "Arrow". So something like <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/getstarted.html> that introduces them to what Arrow is about, what you can do with it and then links to the more in-depth sections for additional details.

So the Install Guide is definitely appreciated, but we also need a landing/introductory page for people viewing arrow for the first time.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15572?focusedCommentId=17508862) by David Dali Susanibar Arce (dsusanibara):*
Hi `[~amol-]` second part of getting started I was assuming was covered by: VectorValue / VectorSchemaRoot / RW IPC.

 

Let me reopen the issue and consolidate all of this example in one getting started document.

 

This ticket will contain all the refactor or ordered needed to do on java documentation.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15572?focusedCommentId=17508867) by Alessandro Molina (amol-):*
I think it's ok that the details are covered by the specific `Vector*` sections. The Getting Started section should have no more than a mention and a quick example of the major features (in case of java I'd say `{}ValueVector{`}, `{}VectorSchemaRoot{`}, `{}RW IPC{`}) and then a link to their relative sections for additional details.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15572?focusedCommentId=17508872) by David Dali Susanibar Arce (dsusanibara):*
Hi `[~amol-]` to maintain and order I jus create this [ticket](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15972) for getting started landing page.
